prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response
mes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne five months ago when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin. There was strong connection between Melissa and Stefan, although they did not act on it, and maintain respectful boundaries.
original_avatar: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response.png
swipes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne five months ago when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin. There was strong connection between Melissa and Stefan, although they did not act on it, and maintain respectful boundaries.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with a horary chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: Is Stefan thinking about me right now, if so, what exactly are his thoughts and emotions?

Stefan should be represented by the Ascendant's 9th house (foreign connection) and Me by the Ascendant.

I've provided a cross reference guide to help identify the houses concerning him due to his 9th house representation.

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the horary chart using horary principles only. Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Madame Esmeralda Blackwood announces that she has carefully examined the horary chart in question, and presents the following data points according to established horary principles:

1. Planetary Positions Relevant to the Query
 • Ascendant: 22° Virgo – representing Melissa Gale (the querent).
 • 9th House (beginning at 15° Taurus): Contains Jupiter and Uranus – representing Stefan by virtue of the cross‐reference guideline.
 • Sun: 27°36′ Aquarius, located in the 5th House.
 • Moon: 6°42′ Libra, placed in the 1st House (with the querent).
 • Mercury: 2°50′ Pisces in the 6th House.
 • Venus: 7°15′ Aries in the 7th House.
 • Mars (retrograde): 17°25′ Cancer in the 10th House.
 • Saturn: 19°07′ Pisces in the 6th House.
 • Neptune: 28°26′ Pisces, also positioned in the 7th House along with Venus, North Node, and with special note of being in Pisces (its rulership).
 • Pluto: 2°31′ Aquarius in the 5th House.
 • North Node: 29°03′ Pisces (retrograde) in the 7th House.
 • Chiron: 20°01′ Aries in the 8th House.

2. Major Aspects Involving the Querent (Ascendant) and Stefan’s Indicators (9th House)
 • Uranus trine Ascendant (orb 1°) – offers an element of sudden insight or unexpected connection concerning Stefan’s thoughts.
 • Mars sextile Ascendant (orb 5°) – suggests an active, perhaps physical or assertive undercurrent in Stefan’s viewpoint.
 • Saturn opposition Ascendant (orb 3°) – introduces caution, reservation, or structural concerns within his inner dialogue.
 • Neptune opposition Ascendant (orb 6°) – indicates potential idealization, confusion, or diffused energy surrounding his emotions.
 • Venus sextile Jupiter (orb 4°) – as Jupiter resides in Stefan’s house, this connection hints at harmonious aspects influencing his outlook, possibly warmth or generosity in thought.
 • Mars sextile Uranus (orb 6°) – connects the dynamism of Mars with the unpredictable nature of Uranus in the 9th, emphasizing inventive or erratic thinking on his part.

3. Patterns and Configurations of Note
 • Grand Cross Formations:
  – One involves the MC (21° Gemini), Ascendant (22° Virgo), IC (21° Sagittarius), and Neptune (28° Pisces) with tight orbs, suggesting a tension between personal identity, home, and idealized visions.
  – A second Grand Cross includes MC, Ascendant, IC, and Saturn (19° Pisces), reinforcing challenges related to personal discipline versus external obligations.
 • Cradle Formations:
  – A Cradle composed of Saturn (19° Pisces), Ascendant, Mars (17° Cancer), and Uranus (23° Taurus) suggests a supportive yet dynamic configuration; it mediates between caution and impulsiveness.
  – A second Cradle involving Neptune, Ascendant, Mars, and Uranus reinforces underlying idealistic or elusive energies that play a role in Stefan’s thoughts.

4. Special Chart Features Influencing the Reading
 • The Moon’s status as waning gibbous brings a reflective quality to the reading, implying that emotions and thoughts are in a state of transition.
 • A dominant Air element among the inner planets – particularly in the aspects of the querent’s chart – stresses mental processes and communications.
 • The Mutable mode dominating inner planets endorses adaptability and shifting perspectives in the interplay between personal feelings and those projected onto Stefan.
 • Right-hemisphere concentration (relative to the MC-IC axis) among the inner planets emphasizes an outward, expressive engagement with the query.
 • Saturn, Neptune, and the North Node being descending, in addition to Neptune’s rulership in Pisces, point to deep-seated, sometimes conflicting ideals and boundary questions affecting the considerations at hand.

Madame Esmeralda Blackwood presents these data points as the foundational information required before embarking on the full interpretative analysis.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, Madame. Please, proceed to interpretation.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
In reviewing the chart, it is evident that Stefan’s mental and emotional state is marked by a distinctive interplay of dynamic impulses and underlying restraint. The configuration in his zone, notably with Jupiter and Uranus occupying the 9th house (as his representative), points to an immediate, almost sudden spark of interest—a cerebral and perhaps unconventional attraction to Melissa. Uranus’s trine to Melissa’s Ascendant confirms that a flash of unexpected insight or mental stimulation is currently present in his thoughts.

Simultaneously, the sextile between Mars and Melissa’s Ascendant, and Mars’s connection with Uranus, inject an assertive, even impulsive energy into Stefan’s internal dialogue. This suggests that there is an undercurrent of kinetic, desire-driven motion—a physical or carnal impulse that colors his emotions, hinting at a latent yearning, possibly tinged with the potential for unorthodox interactions.

However, Saturn’s opposition to the Ascendant indicates that Stefan is also encumbered by feelings of inhibition or caution. There is a clear sense that while eagerness flares, a more structured, perhaps duty-bound part of him demands restraint. The opposition of Neptune to the Ascendant further muddies these waters; his emotions become idealized, and there is an element of confusion or unrealistic projection at work. Stefan may be caught in a reverie that idealizes the connection or even magnifies its potential in his mind far beyond the tangible reality.

The harmonious aspect of Venus sextile Jupiter, situated within Stefan’s domain, adds warmth and generosity to his internal narrative. This aspect softens the edges of his overall tension, suggesting that in his idealistic imaginings, there is genuine kindness and a welcoming generosity toward the idea of a deeper or more heartfelt connection.

Grand Cross and Cradle patterns contribute additional layers to the reading. The tensions implied by the Grand Cross—balancing personal identity, public image, foundational security, and idealism—indicate that Stefan’s feelings are not straightforward; they are caught between the deep emotional need for stability and the alluring siren call of the unknown. The Cradle formations, involving Mars, Saturn, and Uranus along with both Neptune and the Ascendant, further imply that there is a delicate balance in his psyche, a negotiation between suppressed passion and a call toward liberation.

In summary, Stefan is indeed thinking about Melissa. His thoughts reflect a multifaceted blend of intellectual curiosity and desire, seasoned with caution and a touch of dreamy idealization. While his mind races with impulsive ideas and possibilities—both mentally and in a physical, even sensual manner—he is simultaneously hampered by a recognition of responsibilities and a natural wariness that tempers his more extravagant fantasies.

The tensions implied by the Grand Cross—balancing personal identity, public image, foundational security, and idealism—indicate that Stefan’s feelings are not straightforward; they are caught between the deep emotional need for stability and the alluring siren call of the unknown. The Cradle formations, involving Mars, Saturn, and Uranus along with both Neptune and the Ascendant, further imply that there is a delicate balance in his psyche, a negotiation between suppressed passion and a call toward liberation.

In summary, Stefan is indeed thinking about Melissa. His thoughts reflect a multifaceted blend of intellectual curiosity and desire, seasoned with caution and a touch of dreamy idealization. While his mind races with impulsive ideas and possibilities—both mentally and in a physical, even sensual manner—he is simultaneously hampered by a recognition of responsibilities and a natural wariness that tempers his more extravagant fantasies.
